title: Grrrr.. The new client
body: I have brushed the first few times off but now I am officially done with playing ranked and not being able to lock in, therefore banned and losing lp. Another time I have been booted out during loading screen and a remade was decided. Please help me climb. & no it is not my internet. The new client has to be the answer, very frustrated. Thank you!

replies.body:
There's a lot of stuff that goes on between your network and our servers, and it doesn't mean your internet is bad, but it definitely sounds like something might be blocking that connection. When you upgraded to the new client, there are most likely some network settings that could be configured a little better to smooth out those loading screens. 

Let's look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that's out of place, test those changes in a custom or practice game, and hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help at all!
